value.title: NVIDIA Intros Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit for AI and Robotics Ed
value.excerpt: NVIDIA has introduced its new Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit, a new system designed for “learning, building and teaching AI and robotics.” The Linux-based system is built around a 128-core NVIDIA Maxwell GPU and a 1.43 GHz quad-core ARM A57 CPU.

value.title: NVIDIA Will Power the World's Most Powerful AI Supercomputer, Leonardo
value.excerpt: The supercomputer arms race is on, and NVIDIA (NASDAQ:NVDA) is leaving the competition in the dust. Of the world's 500 most powerful supercomputers, NVIDIA graphics processing units (GPUs) or networking equipment (by way of its Mellanox acquisition) can be found in 333 of them.

value.title: Europe unveils 4 new AI supercomputers based on Nvidia architecture
value.excerpt: Computer graphics chipmaker Nvidia Corp. said today the European High-Performance Computing Joint Undertaking is using its accelerated computing platforms and architecture to build four new supercomputers that will propel Europe to the forefront of supercomputing research.
